full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,TSE RING MCHED LNGA'I GSOL MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'DOD 'JO'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(TSE RING MCHED LNGA'I GSOL MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'DOD 'JO'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RGYU MTSAN 'GA' ZHIG LA BRTEN NAS, RANG NYID KYI MOS PA'I 'TSAMS SBYAR TE, RJE BTZUN GYI DNGOS SLOB NGAN RDZONGS STON PA BHO DHI R'A DZA DANG, ZHVA DMAR PA DPAL CHOS KYI GRAGS PAS MDZAD PA'I GSOL KHA DANG, RJE BTZUN KUN DKA' SNYING POS SGRUB THABS RING 'BYUNG DU GSUNGS PA'I CHO GA BSGRIGS RNAMS GZHIR BZHAG PA LA MA TSANG BA KHA BSKANGS, GO RIM KHRIGS SU SDEBS, TSIG SBYOR 'GA' ZHIG GSAR DU BGYIS TE CHA TSANG LA 'KHYER BDE BAR, BTZUN GZUGS ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS GZHIS KA AORGYAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, 'DI RTZOM PA'I MGO TSUGS PA NA BU MO GZHON NU @013B MA LNGAS BZ'A BTUNG STER BA DANG, MJUG RDZOGS SKABS DGOS DAR DANG MU TIG 'BUL MKHAN BYUNG BA SOGSMA BSGRIGS KYI RTEN 'BREL RMAD DU BYUNG 'GRIGS SO,, ,,BKRA SHIS, ,)
